snippet.title: Nova Hearts - Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2506290/Nova_hearts/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=direct&utm_campaign=announcement&utm_content=teaser
Play the First free Chapter "Nova Hearts: The Spark" available on Steam!
Then, the full game will be available in Summer 2024.

A mysterious force of power transforms you and other highly attractive people in your area into superheroes and villains! TEXT, DATE and FIGHT your friends and enemies alike.

Website: https://www.novaheartsgame.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/UrbUgkVrMj
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/NovaHearts_news
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LightbulbCrew
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/novahearts_game/

Trailer Maker: Suzanne Wallace
Cinematics: Histeria! Studio
Music & Sound Design: Thomas Bernardini, Nicolas Isnard
SFX: Mdois, Nicolas Isnard
